System Update

This section is incomplete and needs further work!

  1. Upgrade to newer release version if available1):

    # sysupgrade

  2. Apply all missing system patches2):

    # syspatch

  3. Update proprietary firmware:

    # fw_update -v

  4. Update all packages3):

    # pkg_add -Uu

  5. Update configuration files:

    # sysmerge -d

1)
Releases: https://www.openbsd.org/plus.html.
2)
Errata: https://www.openbsd.org/errata.html.
3)
Packages: https://openports.se/statistics.php.
